00028 #ifndef RANDOMCELLKILLER_HPP_
00029 #define RANDOMCELLKILLER_HPP_
00030 
00031 #include "AbstractCellKiller.hpp"
00032 #include "RandomNumberGenerator.hpp"
00033 
00034 #include "ChasteSerialization.hpp"
00035 #include <boost/serialization/base_object.hpp>
00036 
00037 
00050 template<unsigned DIM>
00051 class RandomCellKiller : public AbstractCellKiller<DIM>
00052 {
00053 private:
00054 
00059      double mProbabilityOfDeathInAnHour;
00060 
00062     friend class boost::serialization::access;
00074     template<class Archive>
00075     void serialize(Archive & archive, const unsigned int version)
00076     {
00077         archive & boost::serialization::base_object<AbstractCellKiller<DIM> >(*this);
00078 
00079         // Make sure the random number generator is archived
00080         RandomNumberGenerator* p_random_generator = RandomNumberGenerator::Instance();
00081         archive & *p_random_generator;
00082         archive & p_random_generator;
00083     }
00084 
00085 public:
00086 
00093     RandomCellKiller(AbstractTissue<DIM>* pTissue, double probabilityOfDeathInAnHour);
00094 
00098     double GetDeathProbabilityInAnHour() const;
00099 
00105     void TestAndLabelSingleCellForApoptosis(TissueCell& rCell);
00106 
00111     void TestAndLabelCellsForApoptosisOrDeath();
00112 
00113 };
00114 
00115 #include "SerializationExportWrapper.hpp"
00116 EXPORT_TEMPLATE_CLASS_SAME_DIMS(RandomCellKiller)
00117 
00118 namespace boost
00119 {
00120 namespace serialization
00121 {
00125 template<class Archive, unsigned DIM>
00126 inline void save_construct_data(
00127     Archive & ar, const RandomCellKiller<DIM> * t, const BOOST_PFTO unsigned int file_version)
00128 {
00129     // Save data required to construct instance
00130     const AbstractTissue<DIM>* const p_tissue = t->GetTissue();
00131     ar << p_tissue;
00132     double prob = t->GetDeathProbabilityInAnHour();
00133     ar << prob;
00134 }
00135 
00139 template<class Archive, unsigned DIM>
00140 inline void load_construct_data(
00141     Archive & ar, RandomCellKiller<DIM> * t, const unsigned int file_version)
00142 {
00143     // Retrieve data from archive required to construct new instance
00144     AbstractTissue<DIM>* p_tissue;
00145     ar >> p_tissue;
00146     double prob;
00147     ar >> prob;
00148 
00149     // Invoke inplace constructor to initialise instance
00150     ::new(t)RandomCellKiller<DIM>(p_tissue, prob);
00151 }
00152 }
00153 } // namespace ...
